channel.title: Community Update [25/08/2015]
channel.description:
Hey guys,
Just a few small changes and updates to let you know about today, as I've posted around the forums recently I am now openly allowing name changes, please drop me a private message with all the relevant information and why you want your name changed and I'll review it. If you've had your name changed already, I cannot guarantee I'll do it again. That being said think long and hard before messaging me. :)
On another note I've stumbled across a cool feature of simpleportal which allows the creation of new pages with cool designs, in the past people have suggested reworking the help tab to include more relevant information, we can now do that and once this page is complete I'll link it on the homepage. You can find the under construction version of the page here:
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/page,FAQ.html
If you'd like to help please let me know, I'd appreciate that a lot! :)
Finally onto the elephant in the topic, I'm polling the return of the reputation system, while this poll doesn't determine anything it's merely to grasp the communities view on the matter. The results will be available after the poll has expired, I'd suggest everyone vote.
Thanks :)

item.title: Community Update [25/08/2015]
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Hitler took the rep! Stalin took the rep! Mao took the rep! Fidel Castro took the rep! Hugo Chavez took the rep!
I’m here to tell you — 1776 will commence again if you try to take our rep!

Read full topic

item.title: Community Update [25/08/2015]
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:32, topic:553083”][quote author=my-swagger link=topic=671999.msg4494241#msg4494241 date=1440524323]

If there is a member that has been logged off for a long time and is not active anymore can you take there name by any chance? Or would that lead to many problems?

That would sure lead to problems

Not quiet, I’ve seen many accounts with like 1 post that have last logged in like 7 years ago.
Guest accounts, you can already take their names by creating a new account.

If anything just do what GitHub does with their name squatting policy (tailored for the forum).

Edit: why don’t we have the “remove post” option anymore, just noticed it.
[/quote]An example of why this would be a problem is because I’m going to take Regex’s name, but I’m sure only a handful of users know who he was.[/quote]

Obviously oldfag names shouldn’t be taken, but an account with a single post that most likely in the help section shouldn’t be off limits.

Also Tom is slowly taking all of our rights way. The latest step was removing the remove post option, I hear he is going to start selling the forum database to Microsoft so we can get better integrated with Cortana.

Read full topic

Guest accounts, you can already take their names by creating a new account.

If anything just do what GitHub does with their name squatting policy (tailored for the forum).

Edit: why don’t we have the “remove post” option anymore, just noticed it.[/quote]An example of why this would be a problem is because I’m going to take Regex’s name, but I’m sure only a handful of users know who he was.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Tom wrote:

This whole poll thing is confusing, some of you can see it, some of you can’t and you’re all identical as far as permissions go. I’ll look into it now.

WarTusk-RSPS:

If there is a member that has been logged off for a long time and is not active anymore can you take there name by any chance? Or would that lead to many problems?

Let me know via PM and I’ll look into it, depends entirely on the account. I’ve done it before though.

yall nigga’s just worried old silab will school you in rep whoring.

[/quote]
mods are fudgeing retarded thats why I retired, I got warned on that shitty thread you created for spamming that picture pure_ posted, Because the rest of the thread had something more constructive to offer I bet everyone was really enjoying the wellington conversation of him trying to convince everyone that his server did anything before mine.



[/quote]im proud that im your role model but hunny you need to be your own self
dont let your memes be dreams
BE SOMETHING
JUST DO IT
